history.narrative: Law 4-120 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-235, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 6, 1982 and April 27, 1982, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 11, 1982, it was assigned Act No. 4-183 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
